synopsis.text: Eruruu discovers a gravely wounded man in the forest, devoid of memories and adorned with an enigmatic mask he cannot remove. Named Hakuoro by his rescuers, he is embraced by a village inhabited by beings with animal-like ears and tails. As he grapples with fragmented visions and a forgotten past, Hakuoro becomes an unexpected leader, defending his newfound home against malevolent forest deities and ruthless tyrants. As war looms, Hakuoro's journey to regain his memories and protect those he cares for promises a perilous adventure filled with courage, mystery, and the unbreakable bonds of gratitude.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
